If you get in to anything classified as a fight, even if you were trying to defend yourself, you will be handcuffed by the school's officer. It's a nice school, but dictating and even excessive rules are restrictive and demeaning.

I also have a daughter in middle school who started New Market for Pre-K, and my youngest daughter who started in Pre-K is now a Kindergarten student at New Market Elementary. It has been a great school for my kids the last 12 years. We love New Market Elementary School.

name: Misty Miller
text: New Market has been so patient with my son and my daughter loves her first year!! I'm so thankful for new market school... it's small and everyone knows everyone and I like it like that!!

name: Jennifer Turner
text: My daughter attended public school and was struggling in reading and the school kept pushing her along as she fell further behind. We were losing hope and came to tour the school and fell in love with the beautiful campus and classroom environment. At the time I knew little about the Montessori method of teaching but knew my daughter needed a different approach. My daughter has excelled in this environment and is now reading above grade level. I love this school and it was well worth the sacrifice to drive 30 minutes to get her to this school. The teachers are amazing and care about the success of each child.

name: Carolyn G.
text: Bruno Montessori is truly an incredible Montessori school.  The teachers and staff are both friendly and professional. The open campus is beautifully maintained and has multiple outdoor classrooms.  There is a wide range of enrichment activities offered. My two children received a top notch education that set them up for success. I highly recommend Bruno Montessori.

name: K Smith
text: We were incredibly fortunate that our son was able to attend JBMA from his enrollment in the toddler program at age two until his graduation from eighth grade. The faculty and staff are talented, compassionate, generous, patient, and endlessly supportive. The educational programs and class trips are first-rate. The facilities and grounds are wonderful. JBMA was—and always will be—an instrumental and profoundly positive component of our son's life, and we are forever grateful.

name: easy e
text: bad school its not safe for students

name: Miriam Anderson
text: I went to school here and the experience was wonderful! The teachers are patient, kind, and very helpful. Montessori teaches not just academics but important life lessons. I would definitely recommend this school to anyone! :)

name: Ragav Baskar
text: I can't even describe how amazing this school is. If you here you are really lucky. Best school I have ever been too.

name: Dana Maxfield
text: Both of my girls went here and the vision of Joseph Bruno Montessori Academy is to provide children and families with an education according to the Montessori philosophy and curriculum. JBMAs focus is not only to provide cognitive education for its students, but to also model a commitment to creating peace and care for the environment for years to come. In theory and practice, they explore how the traditional Montessori curriculum can be combined with current best practices in education as well as technological advances in order to develop a successful group of 21st century learners. JBMA treats each child as an individual, building on their strengths and abilities to become life-long global learners. I could not have been happier with the education and social skills my girls developed at JBMA.  They are now on their way to exploring what else the world has to offer them.

name: Jeffs Owner
text: This place gives me the shivers everytime I think about it.

name: angie gilchrist
text: Mathnasium has been great for us when my kid's online math class wasn't as great as what we were used to as in person classes.  Crystal worked with me to help get my kid where they needed to be when they return in the classroom. Our tutor was fabulous. He was patient and encouraging to my child. I highly recommend Mathnasium.

resp.text: Thank you...it's great to hear...Crystal  and our instructors appreciate your comments. Keep moving forward!

name: clinton martin
text:
My son who is a 3 rd grader is a bright one and we wanted to find something that was more challenging than what the public school was currently offering. My son got a lot of one to one attention, he enjoyed Math more and ended up winning two awards in Math. His team from elementary school won 3 rd place among Huntsvile city schools and my son won first place in individual competition in his entire grade. We are very grateful to all the teachers who have kept him engaged through a very difficult year. The teachers are all so cool, they know how to talk to kids and engage them. I haven’t seen the rigid teaching style but rather saw a deliberate attempt to teach problem solving by approaching a concept from many different styles. This taught my son valuable lessons that there is more than one way to solve a problem.
Much appreciated and I am planning on getting my second child enrolled anytime now.

resp.text:
Mr. Martin - thank you. This makes our day. It's a great feeling hearing of your son's success.
Russ/Crystal
Mathnasium of Huntsville

name: Tina Clarke
text: My (8th grade) daughter has been struggling with math all year. A friend recommended Mathnasium but my daughter was hesitant and nervous to start. After the very first session, she came out smiling and saying that she loved the tutor she was paired with and that he showed her a new trick that made working the problems so much easier. She had a big math test after only 3 sessions and her score more than doubled. We've only been going a short time, but we've seen her grades continue to go up on every assignment and test. We are so happy we found Mathnasium. We started with a girl that had given up on math and was headed to summer school if not repeating the entire class. My daughter is now confident and actually enjoying math. 2 days ago I overheard her talking to a friend on the phone explaining how to do their math homework. I can't recommend Mathnasium enough to anyone who has a child struggling with math. Crystal is so nice to work with and all of their tutors are amazing! So thankful!

resp.text: Great to hear and thank you for taking the time to share.

name: Melissa Harty
text: So happy we found Mathnasium right here in Huntsville!   My two daughters (age 8 & 9) love going here and the staff/tutors somehow make learning math fun!  They encourage personal goal-setting, and have developed a clever reward system to keep the students striving.   Honestly, mine wish they could attend more than twice per week.  No more home-work struggles and I feel such a burden lifted off my shoulders knowing that I'm supporting them.

resp.text: GREAT to hear! This is what we live for! Look forward to helping in their success.

name: Paula Phillips
text: My daughter had many misgivings about tutoring at first, however everyone at Mathnasium Huntsville has done a wonderful job at making her feel comfortable and supported and this is clearly apparent in her academic performance. Her grades are up and so is her confidence! A big shoutout to Crystal and her crew, thank you for all you do!

resp.text: This is what we live for! Great to hear. Thank you.

name: Chris S
text: Mathnasium significantly helped my child's grades.  You can drop off at anytime during their hours, which is so convenient.   My kids are always smiling when I pick them up.  They have a great rapport with the instructors and like earning the prizes.  The owner and manager are both great people to work with as well-very supportive. Highly recommend Mathnasium to anyone considering signing up.

resp.text: Thank you - our instructors appreciate the shout out. We work hard to assist students of all grades and aid them in their success.

name: Heather Armstrong
text: Miss Crystal loves these kids and their progress. The staff loves what they do and gets the kids to love doing math as well.  We are so lucky we found mathnasium.  It saved so many family fights and helped our daughter find her confidence in her abilities.

resp.text: Glad to assist. We enjoy seeing our students excel and move forward.

name: Nita Herrington
text: Incredibly effective. Straightforward process- filling in knowledge gaps and clarifying topics. Our eighth grade daughter is regaining her confidence in algebra, with improved grades after just a few weeks. Highly recommend.

name: Robyn Wainwright
text: I am so glad we found Mathnasium. My daughter was really struggling with math and I wasn’t able to really help her. The way I was doing it and the way she was learning it was different.  She would get frustrated with me and say, “that’s not how I’m supposed to do it”! So you can imagine the frustration we were both experiencing . The staff at Mathnasium has been great and has helped my daughter a great deal. She is really enjoying it.

resp.text: Thank you Robyn. Great to hear we are assisting.

name: Heather Bookout
text: It's a great environment with great people working there.  Both of my girls like it a lot!.  We got great grade-raising results! They keep it fun with great incentives for the kids.  Plus, we feel totally fine dropping the kids off there and running errands.

name: Kelly Finn Parker
text:
Every instructor at Mathnasium of Huntsville
is exceptional!! They all love what they do and it shows with every child that they help.

resp.text: Kelly, thank you for your comments and 5 star rating. Team Mathnasium

name: Lisa Andrew
text: Great teachers. My daughter loves going there. They make math fun.

resp.text: Lisa, thank you and elated to hear we were able to assist. Team Mathnasium

name: Ben East
text: I've used this service from my Jr year in high school to my Freshman year in college. It has continually provided tremendous value in mathematics. The people and management are excellent and the atmosphere is positive and supportive. There's always a tutor That's able to help you work through a problem and grasp complicated concepts. Mathnasium saved me from having to repeat math classes in the past. Thanks again guys :)

resp.text: Thank you, Ben! You are always a pleasure to have in the center. I appreciate your positive attitude and willingness to learn. I'm excited to see what the future has in store for you! ~Phyllis

name: Erin Boles
text: This was the answer to our prayers! Phyllis Norton, the owner of the franchise in Jones Valley,  is the most amazing person!  The educator shared her own family struggle with her kids and math.  That’s why she opened this business. Her passion is evident! She  and the staff worked diligently and continue to follow up with us to make sure our child is getting what she needs. After many, many tutors and lots of other strategies, Mathnasium was what our child needed.  It offered a family peace that we had not had in a while when it came to math. I highly recommend it  here and continuinally recommend it to friends.

name: William Helmstadter
text: Mathnasium is Amazing!  The Instructors really care and the kids enjoy going!

name: Debbie Sclater
text: Great middle school!

name: Linda Campbell
text: My Grandbaby Awesome !
